name: Colin reviews our range of products and fails

testSteps.description: Given Colin has logged onto the application
When Colin is browsing the product catalog
Then he should be presented with 2 products

children.description: he should see a collection of the 'inventory_item_name' element that is of size: <2>

exception.message:
Expecting a collection of the 'inventory_item_name' element that is of size: <2>
